name: T - Caroline Sonia
_source: speak;Sonia; Ah, Caroline!{w} There's my favorite battle fiend!
speak;Caroline; Ha!{w} I could say the same of you!{w} What's the situation here?{w} Is there anyone else who can lend a hand?

speak;Sonia; I'll be honest, we're on our last leg here.{w} Most of the women and children hid indoors while the men lent a sword,{w} but they're all gone{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The monsters just keep coming.
speak;Caroline; Just keep going strong for a little while longer.{w} They'll have to run out of forces at some point.
speak;Sonia; We've gotten through worse together and come out stronger!
